title: Friende Podhum Lyrics Ya Ya Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Friende Podhum
Singer(s): Ranjith, Steve Vatz
Movie: Ya ya
Music: Vijay Ebenezer

OOdhaamal orunaalum irukka vendaam
oru figure-um paarkaamal vazhavendaam
malayile sarakadikka marakka vendaam
mathadhellaam velipadaya pesavendaam

Edhuvum vendaam friende podhu podhum oh..
iravil kooda rainbow thondrum thondrum (2)

Ya yaa, naanga style-a suthum youthu-da
Ya yaa, aana friendship enga veedudaa
ya yaa, life-a 20-20 matchuda
ya yaa, ingae ellaam baalum six-uda

Edhuvum vendaam friende podhu podhum oh..
iravil kooda rainbow thondrum thondrum (2)

L-boardaaga love panna helping parter friend thaaney
empty aaga veliya ponaa ATM-mum avanthaaney

Mathaa pithaa vaathi
andha order ellaam maathi
friendship thaaney osthi
ena enna vaipan machi ..

Nanben serndha neram paaru
life-la pottom 5th gear

Ya yaa, naanga style-a suthum youthu-da
Ya yaa, aana friendship enga veedudaa
ya yaa, life-a 20-20 matchuda
ya yaa, ingae ellaam baalum six-uda

ABCD irupathaaru irundhaa enna
we dont care ..
friendnil ulla R-re podhum
mathatha pathi we dont care..

Urava pathi we dont care
oora pathi we dont care
unmai friendship backup
irundhaal uzhgai velvom
we dont care...

Nanben serndha neram paaru
life-la pottom 5th gear

Ya yaa, naanga style-a suthum youthu-da
Ya yaa, aana friendship enga veedudaa
ya yaa, life-a 20-20 matchuda
ya yaa, ingae ellaam baalum six-uda

Edhuvum vendaam friende podhu podhum oh..
iravil kooda rainbow thondrum thondrum

Ya yaa, aana friendship enga veedudaa
ya yaa, life-a 20-20 matchuda
ya yaa, ingae ellaam baalum six-uda
